Cryptosporidium species (Tests by Microscopic Observation)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    20780-3 Cryptosporidium sp [Presence] in Large intestine or small intestine Tissue by Acid fast stain
    20781-1 Cryptosporidium sp [Presence] in Stool by Acid fast stain
    41488-8 Cryptosporidium sp [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Acid fast stain
